descriptionHtml:
2/7/2013 LSB Imperial Runeblades By Lord Banewrath Sunblade


           This mod adds two new swords to skyrim. Both of these swords are brand new models and are made of silver
 and have holy runes etched into the blades to do enhanced damage to undead. I made the damage of these new swords 
slightly more then the stock silver weapons but less damage then ebony weapons. Both types of swords can be 
upgraded at the skyforge for 1 silver ingot and I added them to the Silver Hands weapon lists. Since the silver 
hand are the only faction I have found in skyrim to use silver weapons, I decided it was best they get these too.  
Now not every silver hand will be carrying these swords. But most of them will have a chance of spawning with them.
So lucky you!

    You may not use this material for other mods that will be uploaded without permission. You CAN translate
the mod to your language and upload it to your national site if you wish. 


   To install drag and drop both the esp and bsa to your data folder. To uninstall just delete the two files.
author: Lord Banewrath Sunblade
